entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
